Cards.Name: Loan
Cards.SpecialText: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.
Cards.FullText: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

Cards.Name: Trade Route
Cards.SpecialText: Trash a card from your hand.<hr>Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.
Cards.FullText: Trash a card from your hand.<hr>Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

Cards.Name: Watchtower
Cards.SpecialText: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.<hr>When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.
Cards.FullText: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.<hr>When you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Bishop
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player may trash a card from his hand.
Cards.FullText: Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

Cards.Name: Monument
Cards.FullText: +2 Coins; +1 <VP>

Cards.Name: Quarry
Cards.SpecialText: Worth 1 Coin.<hr>While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.
Cards.FullText: Worth 1 Coin.<hr>While this is in play, Action cards cost 2 Coins less, but not less than 0 Coins.

Cards.Name: Talisman
Cards.SpecialText: Worth 1 Coin.<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.
Cards.FullText: Worth 1 Coin.<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 Coins or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

Cards.Name: Worker's Village
Cards.FullText: +1 Buy

Cards.Name: City
Cards.SpecialText: If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.
Cards.FullText: If there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.

Cards.Name: Contraband
Cards.SpecialText: When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.
Cards.FullText: When you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

Cards.Name: Counting House
Cards.SpecialText: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.
Cards.FullText: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

Cards.Name: Mint
Cards.SpecialText: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.<hr>When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.
Cards.FullText: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.<hr>When you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

Cards.Name: Mountebank
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.
Cards.FullText: Each other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

Cards.Name: Rabble
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.
Cards.FullText: Each other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

Cards.Name: Royal Seal
Cards.SpecialText: Worth 2 Coins.<hr>While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.
Cards.FullText: Worth 2 Coins.<hr>While this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

Cards.Name: Vault
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.
Cards.FullText: Each other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

Cards.Name: Venture
Cards.SpecialText: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.
Cards.FullText: When you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

Cards.Name: Goons
Cards.SpecialText: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 <VP>.
Cards.FullText: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 <VP>.

Cards.Name: Grand Market
Cards.FullText: +2 Coins<hr>You can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

Cards.Name: Hoard
Cards.SpecialText: Worth 2 Coins.<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.
Cards.FullText: Worth 2 Coins.<hr>While this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

Cards.Name: Bank
Cards.SpecialText: When you play this, it`s worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).
Cards.FullText: When you play this, it`s worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

Cards.Name: Expand
Cards.SpecialText: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.
Cards.FullText: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card.

Cards.Name: Forge
Cards.SpecialText: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in Coins of the trashed cards.
Cards.FullText: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in Coins of the trashed cards.

Cards.Name: King's Court
Cards.SpecialText: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.
Cards.FullText: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

Cards.Name: Peddler
Cards.FullText: +1 Card; +1 Action; +1 Coin<hr>During your Buy phase, this costs 2 Coins less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0 Coins.

Cards.Name: Platinum
Cards.SpecialText: 5 Coins.
Cards.FullText: 5 Coins.

Cards.Name: Colony
Cards.SpecialText: 10 <VP>.
Cards.FullText: 10 <VP>.
